ing: 1 (6.5 ounce) can minced clams, with juice
2 drops hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®), or to taste
des: "An old family favorite, simple and quick, fantastic with chips or crackers."
ins: With a fork, mash the cream cheese in a bowl, adding a little bit of the clam juice at a time until smooth. Fold the clams and onions into the cream cheese mixture until evenly mixed. Stir the hot pepper sauce into the dip.
